LEXSense.DefinitionShort: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= action by which humans or deities reveal information about themselves to (other) humans
= causative process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire information about (other) humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
literally: to know; hence: = state in which humans have the experience, skill, and expertise to carry out a particular activity
literally: to know; hence: = action by which humans or deities associate with (other) humans
literally: to know (someone physically); hence: = action by which two people have sexual relations with one another
literally: to know; hence: = process by which humans know what a certain experience is about by studying or living through it
literally: to make known; hence: = causative process by which humans cause (other) humans to know what a certain experience is about by making them live through it
= person with whom someone is acquainted in an intimate way
literally: to know; hence: = state in which humans or deities are actively involved in circumstances relating to the life of humans and animals and care for their well-being
literally: to know (someone); hence: = action by which deities single out humans from among their peers for a specific purpose
literally: to know (God); hence: = action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity
literally: to know; hence: = action by which humans exercise their minds with regards to a certain matter so that they will know what to do
literally: to know; hence: = state in which humans are endowed with knowledge, often through experience
